title: Add critical golden-path smoke for full first-slice loop including attack resolve
description: Add a release-blocking smoke path that verifies the full first-slice loop (tick, build, train, map interaction, hostile dispatch, deterministic combat resolve, event feed output) using scoped checks only.
acceptance_criteria: A single scoped smoke command validates first-slice loop prerequisites through hostile attack resolve and fails when required loop stages are missing.
Smoke output records deterministic pass/fail evidence for each mandatory loop stage defined in vertical-slice done gate.
Validation remains scoped to critical release path and avoids broad unrelated full-suite execution.

title: Wire hero attachment payload + runtime keys through hostile attack transport
description: Extend `POST /world-map/settlements/{targetSettlementId}/attack` contracts to accept optional hero attachment fields and return deterministic hero attachment metadata/event rows so frontend hero feedback can rely on backend-owned runtime payloads instead of local mock composition.
acceptance_criteria: World-map hostile attack endpoint accepts optional `player_id`, `hero_id`, `hero_target_scope`, and `hero_assignment_context_id` without breaking no-hero dispatch behavior
Accepted hostile dispatch responses include stable hero attachment metadata (or explicit null) and preserve deterministic lifecycle payload ordering
Hero-related failure codes (`feature_not_in_slice`, `hero_unavailable`, `hero_already_assigned`, `hero_target_scope_mismatch`) are surfaced consistently through hostile dispatch contract responses
